ComicInfo.Title: The Secret Diary of Bettie Page, Chapter Seven: Red Menace on the Red Carpet!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Bettie’s trip to the Cannes Film Festival turns the Cold War hot…as the KGB tries to put the “red” in “red carpet.” Bettie has to save the glitterati from the obliteratti, (not really a word), in the latest Deluxe Space Age Mid Century Modern Entertainment from David Avallone and Esau Figueroa.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Joseph Michael Linsner | 1 | B | Cover B | Scott Chantler | 2 | C | Color Photo Cover C | Photo | 3 | D/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Scott Chantler | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Joseph Michael Linsner | 5 | F/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Scott Chantler | 6 |
